regular_rod.description: Just a regular fishing rod made from softwood. Its your first rod so don't expect anything special.
regular_rod.use:
Will allow you to start fishing for **COMMON** fish!
Just use `/fish` to fish, the highest available rod will be used.
regular_rod.buy_message: You can now start fishing for **COMMON** fish. Try using `/fish` c:

hardwood_rod.description: A slightly more enhanced version of the Regular Rod but made from stronger wood! Its able to withstand the pull of even beefier fish.
hardwood_rod.use:
Will allow you to start fishing for **UNCOMMON** fish!
Just use `/fish` to fish, the highest available rod will be used.
hardwood_rod.buy_message: You can now start fishing for **UNCOMMON** fish.

reinforced_rod.description: An enhanced version of the Hardwood Rod reinforced with some metal. The metal in the middle of the rod prevents it from breaking when even stronger fish tug on it.
reinforced_rod.use:
Will allow you to start fishing for **RARE** fish!
Just use `/fish` to fish, the highest available rod will be used.
reinforced_rod.buy_message: You can now start fishing for **RARE** fish.

telescopic_rod.description: An enhanced version of the Reinforced Rod. The center of the rod is not equipped with an extendable arm, allowing it to reach deeper depths while staying strong and durable.
telescopic_rod.use:
Will allow you to start fishing for **LEGENDARY** fish!
Just use `/fish` to fish, the highest available rod will be used.
telescopic_rod.buy_message: You can now start fishing for **LEGENDARY** fish.

expert_rod.description: A complete overhaul of the usual fishing rod. It is equipped with high-end fish tracking while the hook is able to propel into the deepest depth of every sea you want to conquer. Some say you can even use it to reel WHALES...!
expert_rod.use:
Will allow you to start fishing for **MYTHICAL** fish!
Just use `/fish` to fish, the highest available rod will be used.
expert_rod.buy_message: You can now start fishing for **MYTHICAL** fish.

earthworm_bait.description: Just a regular worm put on a hook. Won't do crazy things but still better than nothing.
earthworm_bait.use: Will give you a SLIGHTLY higher chance to encounter higher-rarity fish. Only properly works if your rod is able to fish for anything more than common.

lugworm_bait.description: The lugworm, while looking arguably nastier, provides a higher nutritional value for fish than the regular worm.
lugworm_bait.use: Will give you a NOTICEABLY higher chance to encounter higher-rarity fish. Only properly works if your rod is able to fish for anything more than common.

dragonfly_bait.description: Dragonflies are a culinary explosion for fish of the sea. If you put this on a hook, youre sure to get more special guests.
dragonfly_bait.use: Will give you a MUCH higher chance to encounter higher-rarity fish. Only properly works if your rod is able to fish for anything more than common.

dough_ball.description: A ball made from a mixture of mashed critters and potent nutrients. While too large to be properly eaten by small fish, it lures in more bigger and rarer fish species.
dough_ball.use: Will give you an INSANELY higher chance to encounter higher-rarity fish. Only properly works if your rod is able to fish for anything more than common.

spinner_bait.description: A prop fish filled with the highest-concentration nutritional powder on the market. It will behave like a regular fish while other fish can smell its yummieness from more than 50km away!
spinner_bait.use: Will give you an UNFATHOMABLE higher chance to encounter higher-rarity fish. Only properly works if your rod is able to fish for anything more than common.
